H0.text: In cooking, 190 degrees Celsius is the equivalent to which Gas Mark. 3

H1.text: In cooking, 190 degrees Celsius is the equivalent to which Gas Mark. 6

H2.text: In cooking, 190 degrees Celsius is the equivalent to which Gas Mark. 4

H3.text: In cooking, 190 degrees Celsius is the equivalent to which Gas Mark. 5

A4.text: For temperatures above 135 °C (gas mark 1), to convert gas mark to degrees Celsius (C), multiply the gas mark number (G) by 14, then add 121: (G×14)+121=C
